name: Bahama Mamas - Bardstown Bourbon - Robusto
additionalNotes: Bahama Mamas invented island style and taste. Features A Sumatra Bezuki wrapper aged for smoothness, Piloto Cubano Binder for balance, and infused Criollo long filler to deliver subtle flavors that enhance rather than characterize. The result is a full-bodied cigar that will take you on a trip where the sunsets last longer. They’re dedicated to better quality and value. They’re devoted to offering unique, affordable cigar enjoyment to every premium cigar smoker.
